Package stocker.controller

Class AlarmManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocker.controller.AlarmManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStockerDataListener
    public class AlarmManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStockerDataListener
    Central alarm manager which registers alarm listeners (Watchlists, StockerCharts) and alarms per symbol. Listens to push updates and informs all stake holders when an alarm is triggered, added or removed.
    Author:
    Marc S. Schneider

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlarmManager

        public AlarmManager​(StockerFrame frame)
        Construct a new alarm manager.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • registerAlarmListener

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartAlarm> registerAlarmListener​(IStockerDataListener listener,
                                                             java.lang.String symbol)
        Registers a listener and does some book keeping which enables to determine how many listeners there are for each symbol. A listener is usually a Watchlist or a StockerChart. Watchlists should register each each symbol they represent. StockerCharts represent only one symbol, so they need to register only once.
        Parameters:
        listener - the data listener
        symbol - the ticker symbol in which this listener is interested
        Returns:

      • unregisterAlarmListener

        public void unregisterAlarmListener​(IStockerDataListener listener,
                                    java.lang.String symbol)
        Unregister an alarm listener (usually a Watchlist or a StockerChart). To be called as soon as the listener is no longer interested in the symbol and does not need further alarm updates. Usually that is when the symbol has been removed from the watchlist or the the chart window has been closed.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener which is to be unregistered
        symbol - the symbol that this listeners was registered for

      • addAlarm

        public void addAlarm​(ChartAlarm ca,
                     java.lang.String symbol,
                     StockerChart submittingChart)
        Add an alarm. To be called from or for a StockerChart which has created the alarm. Other charts will be informed that a new alarm has been added.
        Parameters:
        ca - the alarm to be added
        symbol - the symbol that this alarm refers to
        submittingChart - the chart that is submitting this alarm (all other charts will receive an update that this alarm has been added)

      • removeAlarm

        public void removeAlarm​(java.lang.String symbol,
                        double value,
                        StockerChart submittingChart)
        Remove an alarm. To be called from or for a StockerChart which has removed the alarm. Other charts will be informed that the alarm has been removed.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol for which an alarm should be removed
        value - the value of the alarm to be removed
        submittingChart - the chart that is submitting this alarm (all other charts will receive an update that this alarm has been removed)

      • clearAlarms

        public void clearAlarms​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Clear all alarms for one symbol. Only used for StockerTesterImpl.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol for which the alarms should be cleared

      • clearAllAlarms

        public void clearAllAlarms()
        Clear all alarms for all symbols.

      • getAlarmsForSymbol

        public java.util.ArrayList<ChartAlarm> getAlarmsForSymbol​(java.lang.String symbol)
        Get all alarms for the specified symbol. Only used for StockerTesterImpl.
        Parameters:
        symbol - the symbol for which the alarms are requested

      • onPushUpdate

        public void onPushUpdate​(java.lang.String key,
                         long time,
                         double price)
        To be called every time when new push updates are available. Should process the new data appropriately.
        Specified by:
        onPushUpdate in interface IStockerDataListener
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the item which these data refer to
        time - the unix timestamp for which a new price is reported
        price - the price at the time

      • serializeToJson

        public com.google.gson.JsonArray serializeToJson()
        Serialize the managed alarms into a JsonArray.
        Returns:
        a JsonArray containing all information required to restore the alarms at a later time

      • deserializeFromJson

        public void deserializeFromJson​(com.google.gson.JsonArray ja)
        Deserializes and restores managed alarms from a JsonArray.
        Parameters:
        ja - the JsonArray to be read
